revised_title: A List of Seamen and Watermen in the Kingdom of Ireland (1697)
tldr: This article provides a detailed list of seamen, fishermen, and watermen in the Kingdom of Ireland in 1697, as reported by Captain South. The data is categorized by various professions and locations, offering insights into the maritime workforce of the time.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History > Maritime History
